meanings.definition: Capable of being amassed or accumulated.
meanings.sent1: The small coins were amassable in the piggy bank.
meanings.sent2: Over time, the savings became amassable for a big purchase.
meanings.sent3: It was quite amusing to see the amassable amount of candy in the jar.
meanings.sent4: Her amassable collection of stamps was like a colorful mosaic.
meanings.sent5: The snowflakes were amassable on the window, creating a beautiful pattern.
